author: danielrachi
content: In case anyone is interested, I'll be discussing these diagrams at https://discord.com/channels/595666850260713488/1152755207588020264

author: amit0617
content: Hello there! I guess there were few people who were working on creating fuzzers. I want to invite you to do some testing on my Rest wrapper over JSON-RPC methods. I would be more than happy for working on the mitigation of those issues. You can expect a good chance of finding something as this is my first ever golang code. I can't offer you bounties as this don't have any business impact. But if REST wrappers take off with time you might earn some reputation as first auditorsðŸ˜…
